subject: Re: [junit] Help Please!
msgSnippet: Is the path to the jar file correct? If so, are the file permissions such that the jar file can be read? What java version are you using (try java -version).
messageBody:
Is the path to the jar file correct? If so, are the file permissions
such that the jar file can be read? What java version are you using (try
java -version).

The stack trace you gave usually occurs when the jar file doesn't exist
(or can't be read).

John

Tom W wrote:

>Can some tell why this is not running on Solaris 8.0 box, and I am getting following error:
>
>$ java -jar wamu/app/cruisecontrol/main/dist/cruisecontrol.jar -projectname MY_P
>ROJECT_1 -lastbuild 20030101000000 -label 1.1.1.1
>Exception in thread "main" java.util.zip.ZipException: No such file or directory
> at java.util.zip.ZipFile.open(Native Method)
> at java.util.zip.ZipFile.<init>(ZipFile.java:112)
> at java.util.jar.JarFile.<init>(JarFile.java:127)
> at java.util.jar.JarFile.<init>(JarFile.java:65)
>
>
>
